remarks: Value of a group multiple in a structure power.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pwsgrp.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsinvg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwsmulg.s $e |- .xb = ( .g ` Y ) $.
pwsmulg.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
pwsmulg $p |- ( ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V ) /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ X e. B /\ A e. I ) ) -> ( ( N .xb X ) ` A ) = ( N .x. ( X ` A ) ) ) $.
